bill.title: Renewable Energy; Transmission Cable
bill.description: Establishes the regulatory structure under which the Public Utilities Commission can certify a cable company to commercially develop, finance, and construct an inter-island high-voltage electric transmission cable system to transmit clean, renewable energy in the State. Effective July 1, 2030. (HB1176 HD3)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.

(H) Referred to EEP, referral sheet 2
